title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 431.1 - Late payment charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 431.1 - Late payment charge

State Regulations

Any corporation, partnership or person furnishing gas, electric, steam or water service may impose a late payment charge, either
one-time or continuing interest type, because of the failure of any customer to
pay a bill for such service within a specified period therein
stated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
431.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
